description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. Investigate the case of a seemingly possessed girl, explore an island full of secrets, buy and trade gifts, gamble for cash, and flirt your way to success in The Sexy Exorcist!
description.short: Investigate the case of a seemingly possessed girl, explore an island full of secrets, buy and trade gifts, gamble for cash, and flirt your way to success in The Sexy Exorcist!
